1318int nbgl_layoutAddTextWithAlias(nbgl_layout_t *layout,
1319 const char *text,
1320 const char *subText,
1321 uint8_t token,
1322 uint8_t index)
1323{
1324 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddTextWithAlias():\n");
1325 return addText(layout, text, subText, token, index, true);
1326}
1327
1335int nbgl_layoutAddSubHeaderText(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const char *text)
1336{
1337 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
1338 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
1339
1340 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddSubHeaderText():\n");
1341 if (layout == NULL) {
1342 return -1;
1343 }
1344 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1345
1346 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
1347 textArea->text = PIC(text);
1348 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
1349 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
1350 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
1351 textArea->wrapping = true;
1352 textArea->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
1353 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
1354 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1355 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
1356 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
1357#ifdef TARGET_STAX
1358 textArea->obj.area.height += 2 * 24;
1359#else // TARGET_STAX
1360 textArea->obj.area.height += 2 * 28;
1361#endif // TARGET_STAX
1362
1363 // set this new obj as child of main container
1364 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea);
1365
1366 return textArea->obj.area.height;
1367}
1368
1376int nbgl_layoutAddLargeCaseText(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const char *text)
1377{
1378 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
1379 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
1380
1381 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddLargeCaseText():\n");
1382 if (layout == NULL) {
1383 return -1;
1384 }
1385 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1386
1387 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
1388 textArea->text = PIC(text);
1389 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
1390 textArea->fontId = LARGE_MEDIUM_FONT;
1391 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1392 textArea->wrapping = true;
1393 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
1394 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
1395 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
1396 textArea->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
1397 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
1398#ifdef TARGET_STAX
1399 // if first object of container, increase the margin from top
1400 if (layoutInt->container->nbChildren == 0) {
1401 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY += BORDER_MARGIN;
1402 }
1403#endif // TARGET_STAX
1404
1405 // set this new obj as child of main container
1406 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea);
1407
1408 return 0;
1409}
1410
1423int nbgl_layoutAddTextContent(nbgl_layout_t *layout,
1424 const char *title,
1425 const char *description,
1426 const char *info)
1427{
1428 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
1429 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
1430
1431 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddTextContent():\n");
1432 if (layout == NULL) {
1433 return -1;
1434 }
1435
1436 // create title
1437 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1438 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
1439 textArea->text = PIC(title);
1440 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
1441 textArea->fontId = LARGE_MEDIUM_FONT;
1442 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
1443 textArea->wrapping = true;
1444 textArea->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
1445 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
1446#ifdef TARGET_STAX
1447 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 24;
1448#else // TARGET_STAX
1449 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 16;
1450#endif // TARGET_STAX
1451 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1452 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
1453 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
1454 // set this new obj as child of main container
1455 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea);
1456
1457 // create description
1458 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1459 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
1460 textArea->text = PIC(description);
1461 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
1462 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
1463 textArea->wrapping = true;
1464 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1465 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
1466 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
1467 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
1468 textArea->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
1469 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
1470#ifdef TARGET_STAX
1471 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 16;
1472#else // TARGET_STAX
1473 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 24;
1474#endif // TARGET_STAX
1475 // set this new obj as child of main container
1476 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea);
1477
1478 // create info on the bottom
1479 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1480 textArea->textColor = DARK_GRAY;
1481 textArea->text = PIC(info);
1482 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
1483 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
1484 textArea->wrapping = true;
1485 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1486 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
1487 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
1488 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
1489 textArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_LEFT;
1490 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
1491 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 40;
1492 // set this new obj as child of main container
1493 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea);
1494
1495 return layoutInt->container->obj.area.height;
1496}
1497
1505int nbgl_layoutAddRadioChoice(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutRadioChoice_t *choices)
1506{
1507 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
1508 layoutObj_t *obj;
1509 uint8_t i;
1510
1511 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddRadioChoice():\n");
1512 if (layout == NULL) {
1513 return -1;
1514 }
1515 for (i = 0; i < choices->nbChoices; i++) {
1516 nbgl_container_t *container;
1517 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
1518 nbgl_radio_t *button;
1519 nbgl_line_t *line;
1520
1521 container = (nbgl_container_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(CONTAINER, layoutInt->layer);
1522 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1523 button = (nbgl_radio_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(RADIO_BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
1524
1525 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(
1526 layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) container, choices->token, choices->tuneId);
1527 if (obj == NULL) {
1528 return -1;
1529 }
1530
1531 // get container children (max 2)
1532 container->nbChildren = 2;
1533 container->children = nbgl_containerPoolGet(container->nbChildren, layoutInt->layer);
1534 container->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1535 container->obj.area.height = RADIO_CHOICE_HEIGHT;
1536 container->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
1537 container->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
1538 container->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) NULL;
1539
1540 // init button for this choice
1541 button->activeColor = BLACK;
1542 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
1543 button->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) container;
1544 button->obj.alignment = MID_RIGHT;
1545 button->state = OFF_STATE;
1546 container->children[1] = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
1547
1548 // init text area for this choice
1549 if (choices->localized == true) {
1550#ifdef HAVE_LANGUAGE_PACK
1551 textArea->text = get_ux_loc_string(choices->nameIds[i]);
1552#endif // HAVE_LANGUAGE_PACK
1553 }
1554 else {
1555 textArea->text = PIC(choices->names[i]);
1556 }
1557 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
1558 textArea->obj.area.width = container->obj.area.width - RADIO_WIDTH;
1559 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
1560 textArea->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
1561 textArea->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) container;
1562 container->children[0] = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
1563
1564 // whole container should be touchable
1565 container->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
1566 container->obj.touchId = CONTROLS_ID + nbTouchableControls;
1567 nbTouchableControls++;
1568
1569 // highlight init choice
1570 if (i == choices->initChoice) {
1571 button->state = ON_STATE;
1572 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
1573 textArea->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
1574 }
1575 else {
1576 button->state = OFF_STATE;
1577 textArea->textColor = DARK_GRAY;
1578 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
1579 }
1580 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getFontHeight(textArea->fontId);
1581
1582 line = createHorizontalLine(layoutInt->layer);
1583 line->obj.alignmentMarginY = -4;
1584 line->offset = 3;
1585
1586 // set these new objs as child of main container
1587 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) container);
1588 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) line);
1589 }
1590
1591 return 0;
1592}
1593
1602int nbgl_layoutAddCenteredInfo(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutCenteredInfo_t *info)
1603{
1604 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
1605 nbgl_container_t *container;
1606 nbgl_contentCenter_t centeredInfo = {.icon = info->icon,
1607 .title = NULL,
1608 .smallTitle = NULL,
1609 .description = NULL,
1610 .subText = NULL,
1611 .iconHug = 0,
1612 .padding = false};
1613
1614 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddCenteredInfo():\n");
1615 if (layout == NULL) {
1616 return -1;
1617 }
1618
1619 if (info->text1 != NULL) {
1620 if (info->style != NORMAL_INFO) {
1621 centeredInfo.title = info->text1;
1622 }
1623 else {
1624 centeredInfo.smallTitle = info->text1;
1625 }
1626 }
1627 if (info->text2 != NULL) {
1628 if (info->style != LARGE_CASE_BOLD_INFO) {
1629 centeredInfo.description = info->text2;
1630 }
1631 else {
1632 centeredInfo.smallTitle = info->text2;
1633 }
1634 }
1635 if (info->text3 != NULL) {
1636 if (info->style == LARGE_CASE_GRAY_INFO) {
1637 centeredInfo.subText = info->text3;
1638 }
1639 else {
1640 centeredInfo.description = info->text3;
1641 }
1642 }
1643 container = addContentCenter(layoutInt, &centeredInfo);
1644
1645 if (info->onTop) {
1646 container->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
1647 container->obj.alignmentMarginY = BORDER_MARGIN + info->offsetY;
1648 container->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
1649 }
1650 else {
1651 container->obj.alignmentMarginY = info->offsetY;
1652 }
1653
1654 return container->obj.area.height;
1655}
1656
1665int nbgl_layoutAddContentCenter(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_contentCenter_t *info)
1666{
1667 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
1668 nbgl_container_t *container;
1669
1670 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddContentCenter():\n");
1671 if (layout == NULL) {
1672 return -1;
1673 }
1674
1675 container = addContentCenter(layoutInt, info);
1676
1677 return container->obj.area.height;
1678}
1679
1680#ifdef NBGL_QRCODE
1689int nbgl_layoutAddQRCode(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutQRCode_t *info)
1690{
1691 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
1692 nbgl_container_t *container;
1693 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea = NULL;
1694 nbgl_qrcode_t *qrcode;
1695 uint16_t fullHeight = 0;
1696
1697 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddQRCode():\n");
1698 if (layout == NULL) {
1699 return -1;
1700 }
1701
1702 container = (nbgl_container_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(CONTAINER, layoutInt->layer);
1703
1704 // get container children (max 2 (QRCode + text1 + text2))
1705 container->children = nbgl_containerPoolGet(3, layoutInt->layer);
1706 container->nbChildren = 0;
1707
1708 qrcode = (nbgl_qrcode_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(QR_CODE, layoutInt->layer);
1709 // version is forced to V10 if url is longer than 62 characters
1710 if (strlen(PIC(info->url)) > 62) {
1711 qrcode->version = QRCODE_V10;
1712 }
1713 else {
1714 qrcode->version = QRCODE_V4;
1715 }
1716 qrcode->foregroundColor = BLACK;
1717 // in QR V4, we use 8*8 screen pixels for one QR pixel
1718 // in QR V10, we use 4*4 screen pixels for one QR pixel
1719 qrcode->obj.area.width
1720 = (qrcode->version == QRCODE_V4) ? (QR_V4_NB_PIX_SIZE * 8) : (QR_V10_NB_PIX_SIZE * 4);
1721 qrcode->obj.area.height = qrcode->obj.area.width;
1722 qrcode->text = PIC(info->url);
1723 qrcode->obj.area.bpp = NBGL_BPP_1;
1724 qrcode->obj.alignment = TOP_MIDDLE;
1725
1726 fullHeight += qrcode->obj.area.height;
1727 container->children[container->nbChildren] = (nbgl_obj_t *) qrcode;
1728 container->nbChildren++;
1729
1730 if (info->text1 != NULL) {
1731 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1732 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
1733 textArea->text = PIC(info->text1);
1734 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
1735 textArea->fontId = (info->largeText1 == true) ? LARGE_MEDIUM_FONT : SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
1736 textArea->wrapping = true;
1737 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1738 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
1739 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
1740 textArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
1741 textArea->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) container->children[container->nbChildren - 1];
1742 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 24;
1743
1744 fullHeight += textArea->obj.area.height + textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY;
1745
1746 container->children[container->nbChildren] = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
1747 container->nbChildren++;
1748 }
1749 if (info->text2 != NULL) {
1750 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1751 textArea->textColor = DARK_GRAY;
1752 textArea->text = PIC(info->text2);
1753 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
1754 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
1755 textArea->wrapping = true;
1756 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1757 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
1758 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
1759 textArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
1760 textArea->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) container->children[container->nbChildren - 1];
1761 if (info->text1 != NULL) {
1762#ifdef TARGET_STAX
1763 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 40;
1764#else // TARGET_STAX
1765 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 28;
1766#endif // TARGET_STAX
1767 }
1768 else {
1769 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 32;
1770 fullHeight += 8;
1771 }
1772
1773 fullHeight += textArea->obj.area.height + textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY;
1774
1775 container->children[container->nbChildren] = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
1776 container->nbChildren++;
1777 }
1778 // ensure that fullHeight is fitting in main container height (with 16 px margin)
1779 if ((fullHeight >= (layoutInt->container->obj.area.height - 16))
1780 && (qrcode->version == QRCODE_V4)) {
1781 qrcode->version = QRCODE_V4_SMALL;
1782 // in QR V4 small, we use 4*4 screen pixels for one QR pixel
1783 qrcode->obj.area.width = QR_V4_NB_PIX_SIZE * 4;
1784 qrcode->obj.area.height = qrcode->obj.area.width;
1785 fullHeight -= QR_V4_NB_PIX_SIZE * 4;
1786 }
1787 container->obj.area.height = fullHeight;
1788 container->layout = VERTICAL;
1789 if (info->centered) {
1790 container->obj.alignment = CENTER;
1791 }
1792 else {
1793 container->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
1794 container->obj.alignTo
1795 = layoutInt->container->children[layoutInt->container->nbChildren - 1];
1796 }
1797 container->obj.alignmentMarginY = info->offsetY;
1798
1799 container->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1800
1801 // set this new container as child of main container
1802 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) container);
1803
1804 return fullHeight;
1805}
1806#endif // NBGL_QRCODE
1807
1816int nbgl_layoutAddChoiceButtons(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutChoiceButtons_t *info)
1817{
1818 nbgl_layoutFooter_t footerDesc;
1819 footerDesc.type = FOOTER_CHOICE_BUTTONS;
1820 footerDesc.separationLine = false;
1821 footerDesc.choiceButtons.bottomText = info->bottomText;
1822 footerDesc.choiceButtons.token = info->token;
1823 footerDesc.choiceButtons.topText = info->topText;
1824 footerDesc.choiceButtons.topIcon = info->topIcon;
1825 footerDesc.choiceButtons.style = info->style;
1826 footerDesc.choiceButtons.tuneId = info->tuneId;
1827 return nbgl_layoutAddExtendedFooter(layout, &footerDesc);
1828}
1829
1839int nbgl_layoutAddHorizontalButtons(nbgl_layout_t *layout,
1840 const nbgl_layoutHorizontalButtons_t *info)
1841{
1842 nbgl_layoutUpFooter_t upFooterDesc = {.type = UP_FOOTER_HORIZONTAL_BUTTONS,
1843 .horizontalButtons.leftIcon = info->leftIcon,
1844 .horizontalButtons.leftToken = info->leftToken,
1845 .horizontalButtons.rightText = info->rightText,
1846 .horizontalButtons.rightToken = info->rightToken,
1847 .horizontalButtons.tuneId = info->tuneId};
1848
1849 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddHorizontalButtons():\n");
1850 return nbgl_layoutAddUpFooter(layout, &upFooterDesc);
1851}
1852
1860int nbgl_layoutAddTagValueList(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutTagValueList_t *list)
1861{
1862 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
1863 nbgl_text_area_t *itemTextArea;
1864 nbgl_text_area_t *valueTextArea;
1865 nbgl_container_t *container;
1866 uint8_t i;
1867
1868 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddTagValueList():\n");
1869 if (layout == NULL) {
1870 return -1;
1871 }
1872
1873 for (i = 0; i < list->nbPairs; i++) {
1874 const nbgl_layoutTagValue_t *pair;
1875 uint16_t fullHeight = 0;
1876 const nbgl_icon_details_t *valueIcon = NULL;
1877
1878 if (list->pairs != NULL) {
1879 pair = &list->pairs[i];
1880 }
1881 else {
1882 pair = list->callback(list->startIndex + i);
1883 }
1884
1885 container = (nbgl_container_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(CONTAINER, layoutInt->layer);
1886
1887 // get container children (max 3 if a valueIcon, otherwise 2)
1888 container->children
1889 = nbgl_containerPoolGet((pair->valueIcon != NULL) ? 3 : 2, layoutInt->layer);
1890
1891 itemTextArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1892 valueTextArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
1893
1894 // init text area for this choice
1895 itemTextArea->textColor = DARK_GRAY;
1896 itemTextArea->text = PIC(pair->item);
1897 itemTextArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
1898 itemTextArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
1899 itemTextArea->wrapping = true;
1900 itemTextArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1901 itemTextArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
1902 itemTextArea->fontId, itemTextArea->text, AVAILABLE_WIDTH, itemTextArea->wrapping);
1903 itemTextArea->style = NO_STYLE;
1904 itemTextArea->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
1905 itemTextArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = 0;
1906 itemTextArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 0;
1907 itemTextArea->obj.alignTo = NULL;
1908 container->children[container->nbChildren] = (nbgl_obj_t *) itemTextArea;
1909 container->nbChildren++;
1910
1911 fullHeight += itemTextArea->obj.area.height;
1912
1913 // init button for this choice
1914 valueTextArea->textColor = BLACK;
1915 valueTextArea->text = PIC(pair->value);
1916 valueTextArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
1917 if (list->smallCaseForValue) {
1918 valueTextArea->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
1919 }
1920 else {
1921 valueTextArea->fontId = LARGE_MEDIUM_FONT;
1922 }
1923 if ((pair->aliasValue == 0) && (pair->valueIcon == NULL)) {
1924 valueTextArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1925 }
1926 else {
1927 if (pair->aliasValue) {
1928 // if the value is an alias, we automatically display a (>) icon
1929 valueIcon = &MINI_PUSH_ICON;
1930 }
1931 else {
1932 // otherwise use the provided icon
1933 valueIcon = PIC(pair->valueIcon);
1934 }
1935 // decrease the available width for value text
1936 valueTextArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH - valueIcon->width - 12;
1937 }
1938
1939 // handle the nbMaxLinesForValue parameter, used to automatically keep only
1940 // nbMaxLinesForValue lines
1941 uint16_t nbLines = nbgl_getTextNbLinesInWidth(valueTextArea->fontId,
1942 valueTextArea->text,
1943 valueTextArea->obj.area.width,
1944 list->wrapping);
1945 // use this nbMaxLinesForValue parameter only if >0
1946 if ((list->nbMaxLinesForValue > 0) && (nbLines > list->nbMaxLinesForValue)) {
1947 nbLines = list->nbMaxLinesForValue;
1948 valueTextArea->nbMaxLines = list->nbMaxLinesForValue;
1949 }
1950 const nbgl_font_t *font = nbgl_getFont(valueTextArea->fontId);
1951 valueTextArea->obj.area.height = nbLines * font->line_height;
1952 valueTextArea->style = NO_STYLE;
1953 valueTextArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_LEFT;
1954 valueTextArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 4;
1955 valueTextArea->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) itemTextArea;
1956 valueTextArea->wrapping = list->wrapping;
1957 container->children[container->nbChildren] = (nbgl_obj_t *) valueTextArea;
1958 container->nbChildren++;
1959
1960 fullHeight += valueTextArea->obj.area.height + valueTextArea->obj.alignmentMarginY;
1961 if (valueIcon != NULL) {
1962 nbgl_image_t *image = (nbgl_image_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(IMAGE, layoutInt->layer);
1963 layoutObj_t *obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(
1964 layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) image, list->token, TUNE_TAP_CASUAL);
1965 obj->index = i;
1966 image->foregroundColor = BLACK;
1967 image->buffer = valueIcon;
1968 image->obj.alignment = RIGHT_TOP;
1969 image->obj.alignmentMarginX = 12;
1970 image->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) valueTextArea;
1971 image->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
1972 image->obj.touchId = VALUE_BUTTON_1_ID + i;
1973
1974 container->children[container->nbChildren] = (nbgl_obj_t *) image;
1975 container->nbChildren++;
1976 }
1977
1978 container->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
1979 container->obj.area.height = fullHeight;
1980 container->layout = VERTICAL;
1981 container->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
1982#ifdef TARGET_STAX
1983 // On Stax, 12 px between each tag/value pair
1984 if (i > 0) {
1985 container->obj.alignmentMarginY = 12;
1986 }
1987 else {
1988 container->obj.alignmentMarginY = 24;
1989 }
1990#else // TARGET_STAX
1991 // On Flex, 24 px between each tag/value pair
1992 if (i > 0) {
1993 container->obj.alignmentMarginY = 24;
1994 }
1995#endif // TARGET_STAX
1996 container->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
1997
1998 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) container);
1999 }
2000
2001 return 0;
2002}
2003
2012int nbgl_layoutAddProgressBar(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutProgressBar_t *barLayout)
2013{
2014 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
2015 nbgl_progress_bar_t *progress;
2016
2017 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddProgressBar():\n");
2018 if (layout == NULL) {
2019 return -1;
2020 }
2021 if (barLayout->text != NULL) {
2022 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
2023
2024 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA,
2025 ((nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout)->layer);
2026 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
2027 textArea->text = PIC(barLayout->text);
2028 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
2029 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
2030 textArea->wrapping = true;
2031 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2032 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
2033 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
2034 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
2035 textArea->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
2036 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
2037 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = BORDER_MARGIN;
2038 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea);
2039 }
2040 progress = (nbgl_progress_bar_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(PROGRESS_BAR,
2041 ((nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout)->layer);
2042 progress->foregroundColor = BLACK;
2043 progress->withBorder = true;
2044 progress->state = barLayout->percentage;
2045 progress->obj.area.width = 120;
2046 progress->obj.area.height = 12;
2047 progress->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
2048 progress->obj.alignmentMarginX = (AVAILABLE_WIDTH - progress->obj.area.width) / 2;
2049 progress->obj.alignmentMarginY = BORDER_MARGIN;
2050 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) progress);
2051
2052 if (barLayout->subText != NULL) {
2053 nbgl_text_area_t *subTextArea;
2054
2055 subTextArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(
2056 TEXT_AREA, ((nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout)->layer);
2057 subTextArea->textColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
2058 subTextArea->text = PIC(barLayout->subText);
2059 subTextArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
2060 subTextArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
2061 subTextArea->wrapping = true;
2062 subTextArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2063 subTextArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(subTextArea->fontId,
2064 subTextArea->text,
2065 subTextArea->obj.area.width,
2066 subTextArea->wrapping);
2067 subTextArea->style = NO_STYLE;
2068 subTextArea->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
2069 subTextArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
2070 subTextArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = BORDER_MARGIN;
2071 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) subTextArea);
2072 }
2073
2074 return 0;
2075}
2076
2083int nbgl_layoutAddSeparationLine(nbgl_layout_t *layout)
2084{
2085 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
2086 nbgl_line_t *line;
2087
2088 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddSeparationLine():\n");
2089 line = createHorizontalLine(layoutInt->layer);
2090 line->obj.alignmentMarginY = -4;
2091 line->offset = 3;
2092 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) line);
2093 return 0;
2094}
2095
2103int nbgl_layoutAddButton(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutButton_t *buttonInfo)
2104{
2105 layoutObj_t *obj;
2106 nbgl_button_t *button;
2107 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
2108
2109 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddButton():\n");
2110 if (layout == NULL) {
2111 return -1;
2112 }
2113
2114 // Add in footer if matching
2115 if ((buttonInfo->onBottom) && (!buttonInfo->fittingContent)) {
2116 if (layoutInt->footerContainer == NULL) {
2117 nbgl_layoutFooter_t footerDesc;
2118 footerDesc.type = FOOTER_SIMPLE_BUTTON;
2119 footerDesc.separationLine = false;
2120 footerDesc.button.text = buttonInfo->text;
2121 footerDesc.button.token = buttonInfo->token;
2122 footerDesc.button.tuneId = buttonInfo->tuneId;
2123 footerDesc.button.icon = buttonInfo->icon;
2124 footerDesc.button.style = buttonInfo->style;
2125 return nbgl_layoutAddExtendedFooter(layout, &footerDesc);
2126 }
2127 else {
2128 nbgl_layoutUpFooter_t upFooterDesc;
2129 upFooterDesc.type = UP_FOOTER_BUTTON;
2130 upFooterDesc.button.text = buttonInfo->text;
2131 upFooterDesc.button.token = buttonInfo->token;
2132 upFooterDesc.button.tuneId = buttonInfo->tuneId;
2133 upFooterDesc.button.icon = buttonInfo->icon;
2134 upFooterDesc.button.style = buttonInfo->style;
2135 return nbgl_layoutAddUpFooter(layout, &upFooterDesc);
2136 }
2137 }
2138
2139 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
2140 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(
2141 layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) button, buttonInfo->token, buttonInfo->tuneId);
2142 if (obj == NULL) {
2143 return -1;
2144 }
2145
2146 button->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
2147 button->obj.alignmentMarginY = 12;
2148 button->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
2149 if (buttonInfo->style == BLACK_BACKGROUND) {
2150 button->innerColor = BLACK;
2151 button->foregroundColor = WHITE;
2152 }
2153 else {
2154 button->innerColor = WHITE;
2155 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
2156 }
2157 if (buttonInfo->style == NO_BORDER) {
2158 button->borderColor = WHITE;
2159 }
2160 else {
2161 if (buttonInfo->style == BLACK_BACKGROUND) {
2162 button->borderColor = BLACK;
2163 }
2164 else {
2165 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
2166 }
2167 }
2168 button->text = PIC(buttonInfo->text);
2169 button->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2170 button->icon = PIC(buttonInfo->icon);
2171 if (buttonInfo->fittingContent == true) {
2172 button->obj.area.width = nbgl_getTextWidth(button->fontId, button->text)
2173 + SMALL_BUTTON_HEIGHT
2174 + ((button->icon) ? (button->icon->width + 12) : 0);
2175 button->obj.area.height = SMALL_BUTTON_HEIGHT;
2176 button->radius = RADIUS_32_PIXELS;
2177 if (buttonInfo->onBottom != true) {
2178 button->obj.alignmentMarginX
2179 += (SCREEN_WIDTH - 2 * BORDER_MARGIN - button->obj.area.width) / 2;
2180 }
2181 }
2182 else {
2183 button->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2184 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
2185 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
2186 }
2187 button->obj.alignTo = NULL;
2188 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2189 button->obj.touchId = (buttonInfo->fittingContent) ? EXTRA_BUTTON_ID : SINGLE_BUTTON_ID;
2190 // set this new button as child of the container
2191 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) button);
2192
2193 return 0;
2194}
2195
2205int nbgl_layoutAddLongPressButton(nbgl_layout_t *layout,
2206 const char *text,
2207 uint8_t token,
2208 tune_index_e tuneId)
2209{
2210 nbgl_layoutUpFooter_t upFooterDesc = {.type = UP_FOOTER_LONG_PRESS,
2211 .longPress.text = text,
2212 .longPress.token = token,
2213 .longPress.tuneId = tuneId};
2214
2215 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddLongPressButton():\n");
2216 if (layout == NULL) {
2217 return -1;
2218 }
2219
2220 return nbgl_layoutAddUpFooter(layout, &upFooterDesc);
2221}
2222
2233int nbgl_layoutAddFooter(nbgl_layout_t *layout,
2234 const char *text,
2235 uint8_t token,
2236 tune_index_e tuneId)
2237{
2238 nbgl_layoutFooter_t footerDesc;
2239 footerDesc.type = FOOTER_SIMPLE_TEXT;
2240 footerDesc.separationLine = true;
2241 footerDesc.simpleText.text = text;
2242 footerDesc.simpleText.mutedOut = false;
2243 footerDesc.simpleText.token = token;
2244 footerDesc.simpleText.tuneId = tuneId;
2245 return nbgl_layoutAddExtendedFooter(layout, &footerDesc);
2246}
2247
2260int nbgl_layoutAddSplitFooter(nbgl_layout_t *layout,
2261 const char *leftText,
2262 uint8_t leftToken,
2263 const char *rightText,
2264 uint8_t rightToken,
2265 tune_index_e tuneId)
2266{
2267 nbgl_layoutFooter_t footerDesc;
2268 footerDesc.type = FOOTER_DOUBLE_TEXT;
2269 footerDesc.separationLine = true;
2270 footerDesc.doubleText.leftText = leftText;
2271 footerDesc.doubleText.leftToken = leftToken;
2272 footerDesc.doubleText.rightText = rightText;
2273 footerDesc.doubleText.rightToken = rightToken;
2274 footerDesc.doubleText.tuneId = tuneId;
2275 return nbgl_layoutAddExtendedFooter(layout, &footerDesc);
2276}
2277
2286int nbgl_layoutAddHeader(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutHeader_t *headerDesc)
2287{
2288 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
2289 layoutObj_t *obj;
2290 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
2291 nbgl_line_t *line, *separationLine = NULL;
2292 ;
2293 nbgl_button_t *button;
2294
2295 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddHeader():\n");
2296 if (layout == NULL) {
2297 return -1;
2298 }
2299 if ((headerDesc == NULL) || (headerDesc->type >= NB_HEADER_TYPES)) {
2300 return -2;
2301 }
2302
2303 layoutInt->headerContainer = (nbgl_container_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(CONTAINER, layoutInt->layer);
2304 layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.width = SCREEN_WIDTH;
2305 layoutInt->headerContainer->layout = VERTICAL;
2306 layoutInt->headerContainer->children
2307 = (nbgl_obj_t **) nbgl_containerPoolGet(5, layoutInt->layer);
2308 layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.alignment = TOP_MIDDLE;
2309
2310 switch (headerDesc->type) {
2311 case HEADER_EMPTY: {
2312 layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.height = headerDesc->emptySpace.height;
2313 break;
2314 }
2315 case HEADER_BACK_AND_TEXT:
2316 case HEADER_EXTENDED_BACK: {
2317 const char *text = (headerDesc->type == HEADER_EXTENDED_BACK)
2318 ? PIC(headerDesc->extendedBack.text)
2319 : PIC(headerDesc->backAndText.text);
2320 // add back button
2321 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
2322 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(
2323 layoutInt,
2324 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
2325 (headerDesc->type == HEADER_EXTENDED_BACK) ? headerDesc->extendedBack.backToken
2326 : headerDesc->backAndText.token,
2327 (headerDesc->type == HEADER_EXTENDED_BACK) ? headerDesc->extendedBack.tuneId
2328 : headerDesc->backAndText.tuneId);
2329 if (obj == NULL) {
2330 return -1;
2331 }
2332
2333 button->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
2334 button->innerColor = WHITE;
2335 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
2336 button->borderColor = WHITE;
2337 button->obj.area.width = BACK_KEY_WIDTH;
2338 button->obj.area.height = TOUCHABLE_HEADER_BAR_HEIGHT;
2339 button->text = NULL;
2340 button->icon = PIC(&LEFT_ARROW_ICON);
2341 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2342 button->obj.touchId = BACK_BUTTON_ID;
2343 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2344 = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
2345 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2346
2347 // add optional text if needed
2348 if (text != NULL) {
2349 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
2350 if ((headerDesc->type == HEADER_EXTENDED_BACK)
2351 && (headerDesc->extendedBack.textToken != NBGL_INVALID_TOKEN)) {
2352 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2353 (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea,
2354 headerDesc->extendedBack.textToken,
2355 headerDesc->extendedBack.tuneId);
2356 if (obj == NULL) {
2357 return -1;
2358 }
2359 textArea->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2360 }
2361 textArea->obj.alignment = CENTER;
2362 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
2363 textArea->obj.area.width
2364 = layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.width - 2 * BACK_KEY_WIDTH;
2365 textArea->obj.area.height = TOUCHABLE_HEADER_BAR_HEIGHT;
2366 textArea->text = text;
2367 textArea->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2368 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
2369 textArea->wrapping = true;
2370 // ensure that text fits on 2 lines maximum
2371 if (nbgl_getTextNbLinesInWidth(textArea->fontId,
2372 textArea->text,
2373 textArea->obj.area.width,
2374 textArea->wrapping)
2375 > 2) {
2376 LOG_WARN(LAYOUT_LOGGER,
2377 "nbgl_layoutAddHeader: text [%s] is too long for header\n",
2378 text);
2379 }
2380 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2381 = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
2382 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2383 }
2384 // add action key if the type is HEADER_EXTENDED_BACK
2385 if ((headerDesc->type == HEADER_EXTENDED_BACK)
2386 && (headerDesc->extendedBack.actionIcon)) {
2387 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
2388 // if token is valid
2389 if (headerDesc->extendedBack.actionToken != NBGL_INVALID_TOKEN) {
2390 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2391 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
2392 headerDesc->extendedBack.actionToken,
2393 headerDesc->extendedBack.tuneId);
2394 if (obj == NULL) {
2395 return -1;
2396 }
2397 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2398 }
2399
2400 button->obj.alignment = MID_RIGHT;
2401 button->innerColor = WHITE;
2402 button->foregroundColor
2403 = (headerDesc->extendedBack.actionToken != NBGL_INVALID_TOKEN) ? BLACK
2404 : LIGHT_GRAY;
2405 button->borderColor = WHITE;
2406 button->obj.area.width = BACK_KEY_WIDTH;
2407 button->obj.area.height = TOUCHABLE_HEADER_BAR_HEIGHT;
2408 button->text = NULL;
2409 button->icon = PIC(headerDesc->extendedBack.actionIcon);
2410 button->obj.touchId = EXTRA_BUTTON_ID;
2411 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2412 = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
2413 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2414 }
2415
2416 layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.height = TOUCHABLE_HEADER_BAR_HEIGHT;
2417 break;
2418 }
2419 case HEADER_BACK_AND_PROGRESS: {
2420#ifdef TARGET_STAX
2421 // add optional back button
2422 if (headerDesc->progressAndBack.withBack) {
2423 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
2424 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2425 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
2426 headerDesc->progressAndBack.token,
2427 headerDesc->progressAndBack.tuneId);
2428 if (obj == NULL) {
2429 return -1;
2430 }
2431
2432 button->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
2433 button->innerColor = WHITE;
2434 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
2435 button->borderColor = WHITE;
2436 button->obj.area.width = BACK_KEY_WIDTH;
2437 button->obj.area.height = TOUCHABLE_HEADER_BAR_HEIGHT;
2438 button->text = NULL;
2439 button->icon = PIC(&LEFT_ARROW_ICON);
2440 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2441 button->obj.touchId = BACK_BUTTON_ID;
2442 // add to container
2443 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2444 = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
2445 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2446 }
2447
2448 // add progress indicator
2449 if (headerDesc->progressAndBack.nbPages > 1
2450 && headerDesc->progressAndBack.nbPages != NBGL_NO_PROGRESS_INDICATOR) {
2451 nbgl_page_indicator_t *progress;
2452
2453 progress
2454 = (nbgl_page_indicator_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(PAGE_INDICATOR, layoutInt->layer);
2455 progress->activePage = headerDesc->progressAndBack.activePage;
2456 progress->nbPages = headerDesc->progressAndBack.nbPages;
2457 progress->obj.area.width = 224;
2458 progress->obj.alignment = CENTER;
2459 // add to container
2460 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2461 = (nbgl_obj_t *) progress;
2462 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2463 }
2464 layoutInt->activePage = headerDesc->progressAndBack.activePage;
2465 layoutInt->nbPages = headerDesc->progressAndBack.nbPages;
2466 layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.height = TOUCHABLE_HEADER_BAR_HEIGHT;
2467#endif // TARGET_STAX
2468 break;
2469 }
2470 case HEADER_TITLE: {
2471 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
2472 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
2473 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2474 textArea->obj.area.height = TOUCHABLE_HEADER_BAR_HEIGHT;
2475 textArea->text = PIC(headerDesc->title.text);
2476 textArea->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2477 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
2478 textArea->wrapping = true;
2479 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2480 = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
2481 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2482 layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.height = textArea->obj.area.height;
2483 break;
2484 }
2485 case HEADER_RIGHT_TEXT: {
2486 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
2487 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2488 (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea,
2489 headerDesc->rightText.token,
2490 headerDesc->rightText.tuneId);
2491 if (obj == NULL) {
2492 return -1;
2493 }
2494 textArea->obj.alignment = MID_RIGHT;
2495 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
2496 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
2497 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2498 textArea->obj.area.height = TOUCHABLE_HEADER_BAR_HEIGHT;
2499 textArea->text = PIC(headerDesc->rightText.text);
2500 textArea->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2501 textArea->textAlignment = MID_RIGHT;
2502 textArea->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2503 textArea->obj.touchId = TOP_RIGHT_BUTTON_ID;
2504 // add to bottom container
2505 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2506 = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
2507 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2508 layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.height = textArea->obj.area.height;
2509 break;
2510 }
2511 default:
2512 return -2;
2513 }
2514
2515 if (headerDesc->separationLine) {
2516 line = createHorizontalLine(layoutInt->layer);
2517 line->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
2518 line->offset = 3;
2519 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2520 = (nbgl_obj_t *) line;
2521 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2522 }
2523 if (separationLine != NULL) {
2524 layoutInt->headerContainer->children[layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren]
2525 = (nbgl_obj_t *) separationLine;
2526 layoutInt->headerContainer->nbChildren++;
2527 }
2528 // header must be the first child
2529 layoutInt->children[HEADER_INDEX] = (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->headerContainer;
2530
2531 // subtract header height from main container height
2532 layoutInt->container->obj.area.height -= layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.height;
2533 layoutInt->container->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->headerContainer;
2534 layoutInt->container->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_LEFT;
2535
2536 layoutInt->headerType = headerDesc->type;
2537
2538 return layoutInt->headerContainer->obj.area.height;
2539}
2540
2549int nbgl_layoutAddExtendedFooter(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutFooter_t *footerDesc)
2550{
2551 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
2552 layoutObj_t *obj;
2553 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
2554 nbgl_line_t *line, *separationLine = NULL;
2555 nbgl_button_t *button;
2556
2557 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddExtendedFooter():\n");
2558 if (layout == NULL) {
2559 return -1;
2560 }
2561 if ((footerDesc == NULL) || (footerDesc->type >= NB_FOOTER_TYPES)) {
2562 return -2;
2563 }
2564
2565 layoutInt->footerContainer = (nbgl_container_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(CONTAINER, layoutInt->layer);
2566 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2567 layoutInt->footerContainer->layout = VERTICAL;
2568 layoutInt->footerContainer->children
2569 = (nbgl_obj_t **) nbgl_containerPoolGet(5, layoutInt->layer);
2570 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
2571
2572 switch (footerDesc->type) {
2573 case FOOTER_EMPTY: {
2574 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height = footerDesc->emptySpace.height;
2575 break;
2576 }
2577 case FOOTER_SIMPLE_TEXT: {
2578 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
2579 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2580 (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea,
2581 footerDesc->simpleText.token,
2582 footerDesc->simpleText.tuneId);
2583 if (obj == NULL) {
2584 return -1;
2585 }
2586
2587 textArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
2588 textArea->textColor = (footerDesc->simpleText.mutedOut) ? DARK_GRAY : BLACK;
2589 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2590 textArea->obj.area.height
2591 = (footerDesc->simpleText.mutedOut) ? SMALL_FOOTER_HEIGHT : SIMPLE_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2592 textArea->text = PIC(footerDesc->simpleText.text);
2593 textArea->fontId
2594 = (footerDesc->simpleText.mutedOut) ? SMALL_REGULAR_FONT : SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2595 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
2596 textArea->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2597 textArea->obj.touchId = BOTTOM_BUTTON_ID;
2598 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2599 = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
2600 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2601 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height = textArea->obj.area.height;
2602 break;
2603 }
2604 case FOOTER_DOUBLE_TEXT: {
2605 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
2606 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2607 (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea,
2608 footerDesc->doubleText.leftToken,
2609 footerDesc->doubleText.tuneId);
2610 if (obj == NULL) {
2611 return -1;
2612 }
2613 textArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_LEFT;
2614 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
2615 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH / 2;
2616 textArea->obj.area.height = SIMPLE_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2617 textArea->text = PIC(footerDesc->doubleText.leftText);
2618 textArea->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2619 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
2620 textArea->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2621 textArea->obj.touchId = BOTTOM_BUTTON_ID;
2622 // add to bottom container
2623 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2624 = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
2625 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2626
2627 // create right touchable text
2628 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
2629 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2630 (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea,
2631 footerDesc->doubleText.rightToken,
2632 footerDesc->doubleText.tuneId);
2633 if (obj == NULL) {
2634 return -1;
2635 }
2636
2637 textArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_RIGHT;
2638 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
2639 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH / 2;
2640 textArea->obj.area.height = SIMPLE_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2641 textArea->text = PIC(footerDesc->doubleText.rightText);
2642 textArea->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2643 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
2644 textArea->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2645 textArea->obj.touchId = RIGHT_BUTTON_ID;
2646 // add to bottom container
2647 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2648 = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
2649 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2650 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height = textArea->obj.area.height;
2651
2652 // create vertical line separating texts
2653 separationLine = (nbgl_line_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(LINE, layoutInt->layer);
2654 separationLine->lineColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
2655 separationLine->obj.area.width = 1;
2656 separationLine->obj.area.height = layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height;
2657 separationLine->direction = VERTICAL;
2658 separationLine->thickness = 1;
2659 separationLine->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
2660 separationLine->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
2661 separationLine->obj.alignmentMarginX = -1;
2662 break;
2663 }
2664 case FOOTER_TEXT_AND_NAV: {
2665 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.width = SCREEN_WIDTH;
2666 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height = SIMPLE_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2667 // add touchable text on the left
2668 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
2669 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2670 (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea,
2671 footerDesc->textAndNav.token,
2672 footerDesc->textAndNav.tuneId);
2673 if (obj == NULL) {
2674 return -1;
2675 }
2676 textArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_LEFT;
2677 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
2678#ifdef TARGET_STAX
2679 textArea->obj.area.width = 160;
2680#else // TARGET_STAX
2681 textArea->obj.area.width = 192;
2682#endif // TARGET_STAX
2683 textArea->obj.area.height = SIMPLE_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2684 textArea->text = PIC(footerDesc->textAndNav.text);
2685 textArea->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2686 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
2687 textArea->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2688 textArea->obj.touchId = BOTTOM_BUTTON_ID;
2689 // add to bottom container
2690 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2691 = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
2692 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2693
2694 // add navigation on the right
2695 nbgl_container_t *navContainer
2696 = (nbgl_container_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(CONTAINER, layoutInt->layer);
2697 navContainer->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2698 navContainer->layout = VERTICAL;
2699 navContainer->nbChildren = 4;
2700 navContainer->children
2701 = (nbgl_obj_t **) nbgl_containerPoolGet(navContainer->nbChildren, layoutInt->layer);
2702 navContainer->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_RIGHT;
2703 navContainer->obj.area.width = SCREEN_WIDTH - textArea->obj.area.width;
2704 navContainer->obj.area.height = SIMPLE_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2705 layoutNavigationPopulate(navContainer, &footerDesc->navigation, layoutInt->layer);
2706 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2707 (nbgl_obj_t *) navContainer,
2708 footerDesc->textAndNav.navigation.token,
2709 footerDesc->textAndNav.navigation.tuneId);
2710 if (obj == NULL) {
2711 return -1;
2712 }
2713
2714 // create vertical line separating text from nav
2715 separationLine = (nbgl_line_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(LINE, layoutInt->layer);
2716 separationLine->lineColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
2717 separationLine->obj.area.width = 1;
2718 separationLine->obj.area.height = layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height;
2719 separationLine->direction = VERTICAL;
2720 separationLine->thickness = 1;
2721 separationLine->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
2722 separationLine->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) navContainer;
2723 separationLine->obj.alignmentMarginX = -1;
2724
2725 layoutInt->activePage = footerDesc->textAndNav.navigation.activePage;
2726 layoutInt->nbPages = footerDesc->textAndNav.navigation.nbPages;
2727 // add to bottom container
2728 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2729 = (nbgl_obj_t *) navContainer;
2730 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2731 break;
2732 }
2733 case FOOTER_NAV: {
2734 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.width = SCREEN_WIDTH;
2735 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height = SIMPLE_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2736 layoutNavigationPopulate(
2737 layoutInt->footerContainer, &footerDesc->navigation, layoutInt->layer);
2738 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren = 4;
2739 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2740 (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->footerContainer,
2741 footerDesc->navigation.token,
2742 footerDesc->navigation.tuneId);
2743 if (obj == NULL) {
2744 return -1;
2745 }
2746
2747 layoutInt->activePage = footerDesc->navigation.activePage;
2748 layoutInt->nbPages = footerDesc->navigation.nbPages;
2749 break;
2750 }
2751 case FOOTER_SIMPLE_BUTTON: {
2752 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
2753 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2754 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
2755 footerDesc->button.token,
2756 footerDesc->button.tuneId);
2757 if (obj == NULL) {
2758 return -1;
2759 }
2760
2761 button->obj.alignment = CENTER;
2762 if (footerDesc->button.style == BLACK_BACKGROUND) {
2763 button->innerColor = BLACK;
2764 button->foregroundColor = WHITE;
2765 }
2766 else {
2767 button->innerColor = WHITE;
2768 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
2769 }
2770
2771 if (footerDesc->button.style == NO_BORDER) {
2772 button->borderColor = WHITE;
2773 }
2774 else {
2775 if (footerDesc->button.style == BLACK_BACKGROUND) {
2776 button->borderColor = BLACK;
2777 }
2778 else {
2779 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
2780 }
2781 }
2782 button->text = PIC(footerDesc->button.text);
2783 button->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2784 button->icon = PIC(footerDesc->button.icon);
2785 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
2786 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
2787 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height = FOOTER_BUTTON_HEIGHT;
2788 if (footerDesc->button.text == NULL) {
2789 button->obj.area.width = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
2790 }
2791 else {
2792 button->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2793 }
2794 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2795 button->obj.touchId = button->text ? SINGLE_BUTTON_ID : BOTTOM_BUTTON_ID;
2796 // add to bottom container
2797 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2798 = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
2799 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2800 break;
2801 }
2802 case FOOTER_CHOICE_BUTTONS: {
2803 // texts cannot be NULL
2804 if ((footerDesc->choiceButtons.bottomText == NULL)
2805 || (footerDesc->choiceButtons.topText == NULL)) {
2806 return -1;
2807 }
2808
2809 // create bottom button (footer) at first
2810 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
2811 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2812 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
2813 footerDesc->choiceButtons.token,
2814 footerDesc->choiceButtons.tuneId);
2815 if (obj == NULL) {
2816 return -1;
2817 }
2818 // associate with with index 1
2819 obj->index = 1;
2820 // put at the bottom of the container
2821 button->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
2822 button->obj.alignmentMarginY = 4; // 4 pixels from screen bottom
2823 button->borderColor = WHITE;
2824 button->innerColor = WHITE;
2825 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
2826 button->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2827 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
2828 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
2829 button->text = PIC(footerDesc->choiceButtons.bottomText);
2830 button->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2831 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2832 button->obj.touchId = CHOICE_2_ID;
2833 // add to bottom container
2834 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2835 = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
2836 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2837
2838 // add line if needed
2839 if (footerDesc->choiceButtons.style != ROUNDED_AND_FOOTER_STYLE) {
2840 line = createHorizontalLine(layoutInt->layer);
2841 line->obj.alignment = TOP_MIDDLE;
2842 line->obj.alignmentMarginY = 4;
2843 line->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
2844 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2845 = (nbgl_obj_t *) line;
2846 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2847 }
2848
2849 // then top button, on top of it
2850 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
2851 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2852 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
2853 footerDesc->choiceButtons.token,
2854 footerDesc->choiceButtons.tuneId);
2855 if (obj == NULL) {
2856 return -1;
2857 }
2858 // associate with with index 0
2859 obj->index = 0;
2860 button->obj.alignment = TOP_MIDDLE;
2861 button->obj.alignmentMarginY = BOTTOM_BORDER_MARGIN; // 24 pixels from top of container
2862 if (footerDesc->choiceButtons.style == SOFT_ACTION_AND_FOOTER_STYLE) {
2863 button->innerColor = WHITE;
2864 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
2865 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
2866 }
2867 else {
2868 button->innerColor = BLACK;
2869 button->borderColor = BLACK;
2870 button->foregroundColor = WHITE;
2871 }
2872 button->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
2873 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
2874 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
2875 button->text = PIC(footerDesc->choiceButtons.topText);
2876 button->icon = (footerDesc->choiceButtons.style != ROUNDED_AND_FOOTER_STYLE)
2877 ? PIC(footerDesc->choiceButtons.topIcon)
2878 : NULL;
2879 button->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
2880 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
2881 button->obj.touchId = CHOICE_1_ID;
2882 // add to bottom container
2883 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2884 = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
2885 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2886
2887 if (footerDesc->choiceButtons.style != ROUNDED_AND_FOOTER_STYLE) {
2888 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height = ACTION_AND_FOOTER_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2889 }
2890 else {
2891 layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height = ROUNDED_AND_FOOTER_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
2892 }
2893
2894 break;
2895 }
2896 default:
2897 return -2;
2898 }
2899
2900 // add swipable feature for navigation
2901 if ((footerDesc->type == FOOTER_NAV) || (footerDesc->type == FOOTER_TEXT_AND_NAV)) {
2902 addSwipeInternal(layoutInt,
2903 ((1 << SWIPED_LEFT) | (1 << SWIPED_RIGHT)),
2904 SWIPE_USAGE_NAVIGATION,
2905 (footerDesc->type == FOOTER_NAV) ? footerDesc->navigation.token
2906 : footerDesc->textAndNav.navigation.token,
2907 (footerDesc->type == FOOTER_NAV)
2908 ? footerDesc->navigation.tuneId
2909 : footerDesc->textAndNav.navigation.tuneId);
2910 }
2911
2912 if (footerDesc->separationLine) {
2913 line = createHorizontalLine(layoutInt->layer);
2914 line->obj.alignment = TOP_MIDDLE;
2915 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2916 = (nbgl_obj_t *) line;
2917 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2918 }
2919 if (separationLine != NULL) {
2920 layoutInt->footerContainer->children[layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren]
2921 = (nbgl_obj_t *) separationLine;
2922 layoutInt->footerContainer->nbChildren++;
2923 }
2924
2925 layoutInt->children[FOOTER_INDEX] = (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->footerContainer;
2926
2927 // subtract footer height from main container height
2928 layoutInt->container->obj.area.height -= layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height;
2929
2930 layoutInt->footerType = footerDesc->type;
2931
2932 return layoutInt->footerContainer->obj.area.height;
2933}
2934
2943int nbgl_layoutAddUpFooter(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const nbgl_layoutUpFooter_t *upFooterDesc)
2944{
2945 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
2946 layoutObj_t *obj;
2947 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
2948 nbgl_line_t *line;
2949 nbgl_button_t *button;
2950
2951 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddUpFooter():\n");
2952 if (layout == NULL) {
2953 return -1;
2954 }
2955 if ((upFooterDesc == NULL) || (upFooterDesc->type >= NB_UP_FOOTER_TYPES)) {
2956 return -2;
2957 }
2958
2959 layoutInt->upFooterContainer
2960 = (nbgl_container_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(CONTAINER, layoutInt->layer);
2961 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.width = SCREEN_WIDTH;
2962 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->layout = VERTICAL;
2963 // maximum 4 children for long press button
2964 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children
2965 = (nbgl_obj_t **) nbgl_containerPoolGet(4, layoutInt->layer);
2966 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->container;
2967 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
2968
2969 switch (upFooterDesc->type) {
2970 case UP_FOOTER_LONG_PRESS: {
2971 nbgl_progress_bar_t *progressBar;
2972
2973 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
2974 (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->upFooterContainer,
2975 upFooterDesc->longPress.token,
2976 upFooterDesc->longPress.tuneId);
2977 if (obj == NULL) {
2978 return -1;
2979 }
2980 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->nbChildren = 4;
2981 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height = LONG_PRESS_BUTTON_HEIGHT;
2982 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.touchId = LONG_PRESS_BUTTON_ID;
2983 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.touchMask
2984 = ((1 << TOUCHING) | (1 << TOUCH_RELEASED) | (1 << OUT_OF_TOUCH)
2985 | (1 << SWIPED_LEFT) | (1 << SWIPED_RIGHT));
2986
2987 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
2988 button->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
2989 button->obj.alignment = MID_RIGHT;
2990 button->innerColor = BLACK;
2991 button->foregroundColor = WHITE;
2992 button->borderColor = BLACK;
2993 button->obj.area.width = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
2994 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
2995 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
2996 button->icon = PIC(&VALIDATE_ICON);
2997 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[0] = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
2998
2999 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
3000 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
3001 textArea->text = PIC(upFooterDesc->longPress.text);
3002 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
3003 textArea->fontId = LARGE_MEDIUM_FONT;
3004 textArea->wrapping = true;
3005 textArea->obj.area.width = SCREEN_WIDTH - 3 * BORDER_MARGIN - button->obj.area.width;
3006 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
3007 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
3008 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
3009 textArea->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
3010 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
3011 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[1] = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
3012
3013 line = createHorizontalLine(layoutInt->layer);
3014 line->offset = 3;
3015 line->obj.alignment = TOP_MIDDLE;
3016 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[2] = (nbgl_obj_t *) line;
3017
3018 progressBar = (nbgl_progress_bar_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(PROGRESS_BAR, layoutInt->layer);
3019 progressBar->withBorder = false;
3020 progressBar->obj.area.width = SCREEN_WIDTH;
3021 progressBar->obj.area.height = 8;
3022 progressBar->obj.alignment = TOP_MIDDLE;
3023 progressBar->obj.alignmentMarginY = 4;
3024 progressBar->obj.alignTo = NULL;
3025 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[3] = (nbgl_obj_t *) progressBar;
3026 break;
3027 }
3028 case UP_FOOTER_BUTTON: {
3029 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
3030 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
3031 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
3032 upFooterDesc->button.token,
3033 upFooterDesc->button.tuneId);
3034 if (obj == NULL) {
3035 return -1;
3036 }
3037
3038 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->nbChildren = 1;
3039 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height = UP_FOOTER_BUTTON_HEIGHT;
3040 button->obj.alignment = CENTER;
3041
3042 if (upFooterDesc->button.style == BLACK_BACKGROUND) {
3043 button->innerColor = BLACK;
3044 button->foregroundColor = WHITE;
3045 }
3046 else {
3047 button->innerColor = WHITE;
3048 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
3049 }
3050 if (upFooterDesc->button.style == NO_BORDER) {
3051 button->borderColor = WHITE;
3052 }
3053 else {
3054 if (upFooterDesc->button.style == BLACK_BACKGROUND) {
3055 button->borderColor = BLACK;
3056 }
3057 else {
3058 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
3059 }
3060 }
3061 button->text = PIC(upFooterDesc->button.text);
3062 button->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
3063 button->icon = PIC(upFooterDesc->button.icon);
3064 button->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
3065 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
3066 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
3067
3068 button->obj.alignTo = NULL;
3069 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
3070 button->obj.touchId = SINGLE_BUTTON_ID;
3071 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[0] = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
3072 break;
3073 }
3074 case UP_FOOTER_HORIZONTAL_BUTTONS: {
3075 // icon & text cannot be NULL
3076 if ((upFooterDesc->horizontalButtons.leftIcon == NULL)
3077 || (upFooterDesc->horizontalButtons.rightText == NULL)) {
3078 return -1;
3079 }
3080
3081 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->nbChildren = 2;
3082 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height = UP_FOOTER_BUTTON_HEIGHT;
3083
3084 // create left button (in white) at first
3085 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
3086 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
3087 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
3088 upFooterDesc->horizontalButtons.leftToken,
3089 upFooterDesc->horizontalButtons.tuneId);
3090 if (obj == NULL) {
3091 return -1;
3092 }
3093 // associate with with index 1
3094 obj->index = 1;
3095 button->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
3096 button->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
3097 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
3098 button->innerColor = WHITE;
3099 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
3100 button->obj.area.width = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
3101 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
3102 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
3103 button->icon = PIC(upFooterDesc->horizontalButtons.leftIcon);
3104 button->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
3105 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
3106 button->obj.touchId = CHOICE_2_ID;
3107 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[0] = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
3108
3109 // then black button, on right
3110 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layoutInt->layer);
3111 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
3112 (nbgl_obj_t *) button,
3113 upFooterDesc->horizontalButtons.rightToken,
3114 upFooterDesc->horizontalButtons.tuneId);
3115 if (obj == NULL) {
3116 return -1;
3117 }
3118 // associate with with index 0
3119 obj->index = 0;
3120 button->obj.alignment = MID_RIGHT;
3121 button->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
3122 button->innerColor = BLACK;
3123 button->borderColor = BLACK;
3124 button->foregroundColor = WHITE;
3125 button->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH - BUTTON_DIAMETER - 16;
3126 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
3127 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
3128 button->text = PIC(upFooterDesc->horizontalButtons.rightText);
3129 button->fontId = SMALL_BOLD_FONT;
3130 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
3131 button->obj.touchId = CHOICE_1_ID;
3132 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[1] = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
3133 break;
3134 }
3135 case UP_FOOTER_TIP_BOX: {
3136 // text cannot be NULL
3137 if (upFooterDesc->tipBox.text == NULL) {
3138 return -1;
3139 }
3140 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
3141 (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->upFooterContainer,
3142 upFooterDesc->tipBox.token,
3143 upFooterDesc->tipBox.tuneId);
3144 if (obj == NULL) {
3145 return -1;
3146 }
3147 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->nbChildren = 3;
3148 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.touchId = TIP_BOX_ID;
3149 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
3150
3151 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
3152 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
3153 textArea->text = PIC(upFooterDesc->tipBox.text);
3154 textArea->textAlignment = MID_LEFT;
3155 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
3156 textArea->wrapping = true;
3157 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
3158 if (upFooterDesc->tipBox.icon != NULL) {
3159 textArea->obj.area.width
3160 -= ((nbgl_icon_details_t *) PIC(upFooterDesc->tipBox.icon))->width
3161 + BORDER_MARGIN;
3162 }
3163 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
3164 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
3165 textArea->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
3166 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
3167 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[0] = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
3168 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height = textArea->obj.area.height;
3169
3170 line = createHorizontalLine(layoutInt->layer);
3171 line->offset = 3;
3172 line->obj.alignment = TOP_MIDDLE;
3173 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[1] = (nbgl_obj_t *) line;
3174
3175 if (upFooterDesc->tipBox.icon != NULL) {
3176 nbgl_image_t *image = (nbgl_image_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(IMAGE, layoutInt->layer);
3177 image->obj.alignmentMarginX = BORDER_MARGIN;
3178 image->obj.alignment = MID_RIGHT;
3179 image->foregroundColor = BLACK;
3180 image->buffer = PIC(upFooterDesc->tipBox.icon);
3181 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[2] = (nbgl_obj_t *) image;
3182 if (layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height < image->buffer->height) {
3183 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height = image->buffer->height;
3184 }
3185 }
3186 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height += 2 * BOTTOM_BORDER_MARGIN;
3187
3188 break;
3189 }
3190 case UP_FOOTER_TEXT: {
3191 obj = layoutAddCallbackObj(layoutInt,
3192 (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->upFooterContainer,
3193 upFooterDesc->text.token,
3194 upFooterDesc->text.tuneId);
3195 if (obj == NULL) {
3196 return -1;
3197 }
3198 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->nbChildren = 1;
3199 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height = SMALL_FOOTER_HEIGHT;
3200 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.touchId = WHOLE_SCREEN_ID;
3201 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
3202
3203 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
3204 textArea->textColor = DARK_GRAY;
3205 textArea->text = PIC(upFooterDesc->text.text);
3206 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
3207 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
3208 textArea->wrapping = true;
3209 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
3210 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
3211 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
3212 textArea->obj.alignment = CENTER;
3213 layoutInt->upFooterContainer->children[0] = (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea;
3214 break;
3215 }
3216 default:
3217 return -2;
3218 }
3219
3220 // subtract up footer height from main container height
3221 layoutInt->container->obj.area.height -= layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height;
3222
3223 layoutInt->children[UP_FOOTER_INDEX] = (nbgl_obj_t *) layoutInt->upFooterContainer;
3224
3225 layoutInt->upFooterType = upFooterDesc->type;
3226
3227 return layoutInt->upFooterContainer->obj.area.height;
3228}
3229
3243int nbgl_layoutAddProgressIndicator(nbgl_layout_t *layout,
3244 uint8_t activePage,
3245 uint8_t nbPages,
3246 bool withBack,
3247 uint8_t backToken,
3248 tune_index_e tuneId)
3249{
3250 nbgl_layoutHeader_t headerDesc = {.type = HEADER_BACK_AND_PROGRESS,
3251 .separationLine = false,
3252 .progressAndBack.activePage = activePage,
3253 .progressAndBack.nbPages = nbPages,
3254 .progressAndBack.token = backToken,
3255 .progressAndBack.tuneId = tuneId,
3256 .progressAndBack.withBack = withBack,
3257 .progressAndBack.actionIcon = NULL,
3258 .progressAndBack.actionToken = NBGL_INVALID_TOKEN};
3259 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddProgressIndicator():\n");
3260
3261 return nbgl_layoutAddHeader(layout, &headerDesc);
3262}
3263
3272int nbgl_layoutAddSpinner(nbgl_layout_t *layout, const char *text, bool fixed)
3273{
3274 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layoutInt = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layout;
3275 nbgl_text_area_t *textArea;
3276 nbgl_spinner_t *spinner;
3277
3278 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutAddSpinner():\n");
3279 if (layout == NULL) {
3280 return -1;
3281 }
3282
3283 // create spinner
3284 spinner = (nbgl_spinner_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(SPINNER, layoutInt->layer);
3285 spinner->position = fixed ? 0xFF : 0;
3286 spinner->obj.alignmentMarginY = -20;
3287 spinner->obj.alignTo = NULL;
3288 spinner->obj.alignment = CENTER;
3289 // set this new spinner as child of the container
3290 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) spinner);
3291
3292 // create text area
3293 textArea = (nbgl_text_area_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(TEXT_AREA, layoutInt->layer);
3294 textArea->textColor = BLACK;
3295 textArea->text = PIC(text);
3296 textArea->textAlignment = CENTER;
3297 textArea->fontId = SMALL_REGULAR_FONT;
3298 textArea->wrapping = true;
3299#ifdef TARGET_STAX
3300 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 20;
3301#else // TARGET_STAX
3302 textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY = 24;
3303#endif // TARGET_STAX
3304 textArea->obj.alignTo = (nbgl_obj_t *) spinner;
3305 textArea->obj.alignment = BOTTOM_MIDDLE;
3306 textArea->obj.area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
3307 textArea->obj.area.height = nbgl_getTextHeightInWidth(
3308 textArea->fontId, textArea->text, textArea->obj.area.width, textArea->wrapping);
3309 textArea->style = NO_STYLE;
3310
3311 // center spinner + text vertically
3312 spinner->obj.alignmentMarginY
3313 = -(textArea->obj.alignmentMarginY + textArea->obj.area.height) / 2;
3314
3315 // set this new spinner as child of the container
3316 layoutAddObject(layoutInt, (nbgl_obj_t *) textArea);
3317
3318 if (!fixed) {
3319 // update ticker to update the spinner periodically
3320 nbgl_screenTickerConfiguration_t tickerCfg;
3321
3322 tickerCfg.tickerIntervale = SPINNER_REFRESH_PERIOD; // ms
3323 tickerCfg.tickerValue = SPINNER_REFRESH_PERIOD; // ms
3324 tickerCfg.tickerCallback = &spinnerTickerCallback;
3325 nbgl_screenUpdateTicker(layoutInt->layer, &tickerCfg);
3326 }
3327
3328 return 0;
3329}
3330
3337int nbgl_layoutDraw(nbgl_layout_t *layoutParam)
3338{
3339 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layout = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layoutParam;
3340
3341 if (layout == NULL) {
3342 return -1;
3343 }
3344 LOG_DEBUG(LAYOUT_LOGGER,
3345 "nbgl_layoutDraw(): container.nbChildren =%d, layout->nbChildren = %d\n",
3346 layout->container->nbChildren,
3347 layout->nbChildren);
3348 if (layout->tapText) {
3349 // set this new container as child of main container
3350 layoutAddObject(layout, (nbgl_obj_t *) layout->tapText);
3351 }
3352 if (layout->withLeftBorder == true) {
3353 // draw now the line
3354 nbgl_line_t *line = createLeftVerticalLine(layout->layer);
3355 layout->children[LEFT_BORDER_INDEX] = (nbgl_obj_t *) line;
3356 }
3357 nbgl_screenRedraw();
3358
3359 return 0;
3360}
3361
3368int nbgl_layoutRelease(nbgl_layout_t *layoutParam)
3369{
3370 nbgl_layoutInternal_t *layout = (nbgl_layoutInternal_t *) layoutParam;
3371 LOG_DEBUG(PAGE_LOGGER, "nbgl_layoutRelease(): \n");
3372 if (layout == NULL) {
3373 return -1;
3374 }
3375 // if modal
3376 if (layout->modal) {
3377 nbgl_screenPop(layout->layer);
3378 }
3379 layout->nbChildren = 0;
3380 return 0;
3381}
